8.7 The FILE-SYSTEM module

file-properties

Function

Summary

Returns all the properties of a file system entity.

Signature

file-properties file => properties

Arguments

file
An instance of <pathname>.

Values

properties
An instance of a concrete subclass of <explicit-key-collection>.

Library

system

Module

file-system

Description

Returns all the properties of file. The keys to the properties collection are the same as those use by file-property, above.

Example

file-properties() [#"size"]

See also

file-property, page 166

file-property-setter, page 168

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
